title: Products
categoryAttributesDescription: Fill in the product characteristics for the selected category
noAttributesMessage: This category doesn't require additional characteristics
requiredFieldsInfo: Fields marked as required must be filled
variantsStepDescription: Configure product variants if you have different versions (sizes, colors, etc.)
enableVariantsDescription: Create different versions of the product with various characteristics
simpleVariantsDescription: Quick variant creation using basic attributes
advancedVariantsDescription: Full control over variants and their attributes
noAttributesForCategory: This category has no variant attributes
selectDifferentCategory: Select a different category to use variants
setupAttributesFirst: Set up attributes first to create variants
